## Description

Create a new transaction account.  
Transaction accounts are capable to perform bank services such as deposit and transfer to other active transaction accounts.

## Params

*   **first_name** - First name of the account holder
*   **last_name (optional) -** Last name of the account holder
*   **vatNumber** -

## Description

Check the status of a transaction account.  
This service is dependency of bank-services api, it ensures that only active accounts can be participants of service transactions.

## Params

*   **vatNumber** - account holder vatNumber

## Description

Deposit a value to a transaction account.  
Destination account will be same as source(`vatNumberSource`) account.

## Params

*   **vatNumberSource** - account holder vatNumber that will receive the deposit.
*   **currency** - deposit currency
*   **value** - deposit amount

## Description

Transfer a value between two different active accounts.  
This method will execute the transfer only if both transaction accounts are active.

## Params

*   **vatNumberSource** - account holder vatNumber that will send the value to another transaction account.
*   **vatNumberDestination -** account holder vatNumber that will receive the transfer from another transaction account.
*   **currency** - deposit currency
*   **value** - deposit amount
